name: Intelliarts Ltd.
tagline: Dedicated software development teams in Ukraine
description:
Intelliarts establishes and runs dedicated development teams in Ukraine for its customers worldwide. With team augmentation model, we can empower your software development team with engineers who will bring required expertise/skills.
Platforms: browser extensions (Chrome, Firefox, IE, Opera, Safari), mobile applications (Android, iOS), web applications, big data solutions, cloud/SaaS solutions.

Technologies: Java, Ruby, Python, JavaScript, Objective C/Swift, C++, XML/XSLT.
Domains: business intelligence, digital publishing, business process automation.
